data.taskTitle: is our slack connector truncating task title?

data.approach: Confirmed bug: hardcoded 120-char limit in messageToItem(). Will increase limit and add ellipsis indicator when truncation occurs. Also check Telegram adapter which has same issue.

summary: Fixed hardcoded 120-char title truncation in Slack adapter (tools/ingest/adapters/slack/index.js:352)
Increased title limit from 120 to 200 chars (matching Gmail adapter)
Added ellipsis indicator when truncation occurs
Applied same fix to Telegram adapter (2 locations: messageToItem and mediaGroupToItem)
